description: VMware vSphere Dashboard (Grafana 7.5 / new Time-Series Panel)

targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("vcenter")) AS "vCenter" FROM (SELECT "overhead_average", "vcenter" FROM  "vsphere_cluster_mem" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("clustername")) AS "Cluster"  FROM (SELECT "totalmhz_average", "clustername" FROM  "vsphere_cluster_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("esxhostname")) AS "ESXi" FROM (SELECT "coreUtilization_average", "esxhostname" FROM  "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("vmname")) AS "VM" FROM (SELECT "usage_average", "vmname" FROM  "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT count(distinct("dsname")) AS "Datastore" FROM (SELECT "capacity_latest", "dsname" FROM  "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT last("uptime_latest") AS "Uptime" FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(null)

SELECT mean("usage_average") AS "CPU Usage" FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE ("vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/ AND "cpu" = 'instance-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_average") AS "RAM Usage" FROM "vsphere_host_mem" WHERE ("vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(null)
SELECT last("usagemhz_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "clustername" fill(none)

SELECT last("totalCapacity_average") * (last("usage_average")) / 100 * 1024 FROM "vsphere_host_mem" WHERE  ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "clustername"  fill(none)
SELECT last("used_latest") * (100 / last("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) , "source"  fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("ready_summation") FROM "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE ("vmname" =~ /^$virtualmachine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "vmname" fill(none)

panels.title: Virtual Machine Disk Performance (Read VMFS Block IOPS)
Virtual Machine Disk Performance (Write VMFS Block IOPS)
Virtual Machine Disk Performance (Block Latency Total)

list.label: Cluster
list.name: clustername
list.query: select DISTINCT("clustername") from (select "usage_average","clustername" from "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter AND "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/)

list.label: ESXi Server
list.name: esxi
list.query: select DISTINCT("esxhostname") from (select "usage_average","esxhostname" from "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter AND "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("dsname") from (select "used_latest","dsname" from "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE $timeFilter AND "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/ and "dsname"  !~ /MGMT*/ and "dsname"  !~ /COMPUTE*/ )
list.label: Datastore
list.name: datastore
list.query: select DISTINCT("dsname") from (select "used_latest","dsname" from "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE $timeFilter AND "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/ and "dsname"  !~ /MGMT*/ and "dsname"  !~ /COMPUTE*/ )

list.label: VM
list.name: virtualmachine
list.query: select DISTINCT("vmname") from (select "ready_summation","vmname" from "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter AND "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/)

title: VMware vSphere  - Overview
